name: Edward B. LYON, Jr., petitioner, v. TEXAS.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Edward B. LYON, Jr., petitioner,
v.
TEXAS.
attorneys: Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeals of Texas, Sixth District, dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
casebody.head_matter:
Edward B. LYON, Jr., petitioner,
v.
TEXAS.
No. 13-6022.
Supreme Court of the United States
Nov. 4, 2013.
Case below, 2013 WL 1143724.
Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeals of Texas, Sixth District, dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
